# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a speech detector with default settings.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init()
```

## Discussion

The default settings enable the VAD model with a value of [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechDetector/SensitivityLevel/medium] and do not report the VAD model’s moment-to-moment results in its result sequence.

## Creating a detector

- **init(detectionOptions:reportResults:)**: Creates a speech detector.
- **SpeechDetector.DetectionOptions**: Allows clients to customize an instance of a speech detector.
- **SpeechDetector.SensitivityLevel**: Determines how “aggressive” the voice activity detection (VAD) model will be.
